Content: 2*n34506a0224*section a answer all questions.for questions 110, in section a, select one answer from a to d and put a cross in the box .if you change your mind, put a line through the box  and thenmark your new answer with a cross .1 a volt can be defined as   a a coulomb per joule   b a coulomb per second   c a joule per coulomb   d a joule per second(total for question 1 = 1 mark)2 which of the following electromagnetic radiations has the highest frequency?   a infrared   b radio   c ultraviolet   d x-rays(total for question 2 = 1 mark)3 which of the following properties could not be demonstrated using sound waves?   a diffraction   b polarisation   c reflection   d refraction(total for question 3 = 1 mark)
